<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Book of Warding Prayers](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2172)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Divine" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=48" />
<trait label="Grimoire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=387" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 111 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 425 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Script in a language of the Outer Planes adorns this book's spine, and a deity's symbol is etched on its cover. _Books of warding prayers_ are each devoted to a particular deity and are also a [religious symbol](/Equipment.aspx?ID=41) of that deity.

**Activate** <actions string="Free Action" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561)) **Frequency** once per day; **Trigger** Your last action was to cast a prepared divine spell granted by your deity;  **Effect** You and all your allies in a 30-foot [emanation](/Rules.aspx?ID=2387) gain [resistance](/Rules.aspx?ID=2312) 10 to [spirit](/Traits.aspx?ID=737) damage for 1 minute. You can instead choose to grant resistance to holy effects instead of spirit damage if the spell you cast had the [holy](/Traits.aspx?ID=517) trait, or resistance to [unholy](/Traits.aspx?ID=521) effects instead of spirit if your spell had the unholy trait.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
